Title: Archiving of study analysis environments (syntax, intermediate results, etc.) for future validation or reproducility under regulations.
Description: Syntax/code to be archived indefinitely for future validation/reproducibility purposes (peer review). A clear archiving policy should be in place and users should be made aware of it.

Evidence.Evidence Artifact Example: Approved standard operating procedure defining when, how, and where analysis environments and artifacts are archived, retention periods, access controls, and retrieval processes.
Metadata structured files recovering workflow execution details (i.e. JSON, Ro-Crate)
